title: Large 2 bedroom in Lynn now Available
posting_body: Large 2 bedroom 1 Bath apartment in the Historical Diamond district of Lynn is now available.
● Beautiful old-world charm hardwood floors in the Livingroom, bedroom and foyer.
● Less than a 5-minute walk to the beach, Central Square Station, bus line 441/442 and Commuter Rail.
5-minute drive to Market Basket and other Grocery stores.
● Experience the wonders of old town, Union Street for shopping and dining.
● Very quiet corner unit on the 2th floor.
First and last month's rent due at signing
Must have verifiable income and able to pass a background check.
Private viewing available by contacting the General Manager
